unnormalised: FYI, the India vs. Pakistan cricket match is scheduled for 15/10/2024 at 2:30 PM IST, but prepone it if rain is forecast. Remember that practice matches usually start around 10:00 AM local time.
normalised: F-Y-I, the India versus Pakistan cricket match is scheduled for fifteenth October two thousand and twenty four at two thirty P-M I-S-T, but prepone it if rain is forecast. Remember that practice matches usually start around ten A-M local time.
